languages.text: "Скажем так — мой близкий друг, имя которого я не хочу разглашать, недавно получил в дар имморталиум. Как считаете, что ему стоит предпринять в ответ?"

traits.locale_text: "Скажем так — мой близкий друг, имя которого я не хочу разглашать, недавно получил в дар имморталиум. Как считаете, что ему стоит предпринять в ответ?"

languages.text: "Let us say that a close friend of mine, whose name I shall not reveal, recently received an immortalium as a gift. How should he respond, in your opinion?"
languages.original_text: "Скажем так — мой близкий друг, имя которого я не хочу разглашать, недавно получил в дар имморталиум. Как считаете, что ему стоит предпринять в ответ?"

traits.locale_text: "Let us say that a close friend of mine, whose name I shall not reveal, recently received an immortalium as a gift. How should he respond, in your opinion?"
"Let us say that a close friend of mine, whose name I shall not reveal, recently received an immortalium as a gift. How should he respond, in your opinion?"
"Let us say that a close friend of mine, whose name I shall not reveal, recently received an immortalium as a gift. How should he respond, in your opinion?"
"Let us say that a close friend of mine, whose name I shall not reveal, recently received an immortalium as a gift. How should he respond, in your opinion?"

languages.text: «Digamos que un buen amigo mío, cuyo nombre no revelaré, ha recibido hace poco un inmortalium como regalo. En su opinión, ¿cómo debería reaccionar?».
languages.original_text: "Let us say that a close friend of mine, whose name I shall not reveal, recently received an immortalium as a gift. How should he respond, in your opinion?"

traits.locale_text: «Digamos que un buen amigo mío, cuyo nombre no revelaré, ha recibido hace poco un inmortalium como regalo. En su opinión, ¿cómo debería reaccionar?».

languages.text: 「名前は伏せるが、私の親しい友人が最近、イモータリウムをプレゼントされたとしよう。彼はそれに対してどんなお返しをすればいいと思う？」
languages.original_text: "Let us say that a close friend of mine, whose name I shall not reveal, recently received an immortalium as a gift. How should he respond, in your opinion?"

traits.locale_text: 「名前は伏せるが、私の親しい友人が最近、イモータリウムをプレゼントされたとしよう。彼はそれに対してどんなお返しをすればいいと思う？」

languages.text: “这么说吧，我有位密友，名字暂时保密。他最近收到了一件礼物，是一朵永生花。在你看来，他应该如何回应？”
languages.original_text: "Let us say that a close friend of mine, whose name I shall not reveal, recently received an immortalium as a gift. How should he respond, in your opinion?"

traits.locale_text: “这么说吧，我有位密友，名字暂时保密。他最近收到了一件礼物，是一朵永生花。在你看来，他应该如何回应？”

languages.text: « Disons qu'{mf|un de mes amis proches|une de mes amies proches}, dont je préfère taire le nom, a récemment reçu un immortalium. Comment doit-{mf|il|elle} réagir à ce cadeau, selon vous ? »
languages.original_text: "Let us say that a close friend of mine, whose name I shall not reveal, recently received an immortalium as a gift. How should he respond, in your opinion?"

traits.locale_text: « Disons qu'{mf|un de mes amis proches|une de mes amies proches}, dont je préfère taire le nom, a récemment reçu un immortalium. Comment doit-{mf|il|elle} réagir à ce cadeau, selon vous ? »

languages.text: "Sagen wir, ein enger Freund von mir, dessen Namen ich nicht preisgeben werde, hat kürzlich ein Immortalium als Geschenk erhalten. Wie sollte er Eurer Meinung nach reagieren?"
languages.original_text: "Let us say that a close friend of mine, whose name I shall not reveal, recently received an immortalium as a gift. How should he respond, in your opinion?"

traits.locale_text: "Sagen wir, ein enger Freund von mir, dessen Namen ich nicht preisgeben werde, hat kürzlich ein Immortalium als Geschenk erhalten. Wie sollte er Eurer Meinung nach reagieren?"

languages.text: "Adı lazım değil, yakın bir arkadaşıma geçenlerde hediye olarak bir immortalium hediye edilmiş. Sence buna nasıl karşılık vermeli?"
languages.original_text: "Let us say that a close friend of mine, whose name I shall not reveal, recently received an immortalium as a gift. How should he respond, in your opinion?"

traits.locale_text: "Adı lazım değil, yakın bir arkadaşıma geçenlerde hediye olarak bir immortalium hediye edilmiş. Sence buna nasıl karşılık vermeli?"
